mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_reactions (post_id, user_id, type, created_at) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{type}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM post_reactions WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND type = #{type}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.image_path, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM post_reactions r JOIN posts p ON p.id = r.post_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND r.type = 'BOOKMARK' ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
